DPRK Foreign Minister Back Home from China
   Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and his party returned home on Tuesday after visiting the People's Republic of China.
 He was greeted at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il, officials concerned and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe.
